meanings.definition: The process by which a substance absorbs moisture from the air and dissolves in it.
meanings.sent1: The deliquescence of the salt turned it into a liquid.
meanings.sent2: The deliquescence of the sugar made it sticky.
meanings.sent3: The deliquescence of the candy caused a sticky situation.
meanings.sent4: The deliquescence of the powder transformed it into a liquid state.
meanings.sent5: The deliquescence of the substance was like magic turning it into a liquid before our eyes.

meanings.definition: The act of becoming liquid by absorbing moisture from the air.
meanings.sent1: After the deliquescence, the powder became a liquid.
meanings.sent2: The deliquescence of the salt made it dissolve into a liquid.
meanings.sent3: The deliquescence of the chocolate bar was unexpected but delicious.
meanings.sent4: The deliquescence of the ice cream made it melt rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The deliquescence of the substance was so quick, it surprised everyone.
